title: When is Bane coming out?
body: When is Bane coming out? Or like, will he ever come out? Like you know, that beefy dude in the Ekko cinematic? (Obviously not Bane but he reminds me of him)

replies.body: you realise that champion is singed right?

You realize Riot themselves said it wasn't singed right?

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/3ixt4amr-whyyyyyy-riot-why-why-change-urgot-that-much?comment=000300040002

Honestly, I'm not seeing the resemblance. There are plenty of differences between the character from the video and any of Singed's skins, you can't even combine aspects of several of Singed's skins to get something looking like the guy in the video.

It *might* be hinting at what he would look like after a big visual rework, but as it stands there's few similarities between them.
You realise that character was probably never intended to be a champion, right?

Considering the stupidity in this thread, it is sad that the one comment that is probably right got downvoted.

The person in the ekko trailer is likely just a random goon, that has similar tech to singed/Urgot.
